column9: As a precaution, the safety operator intervened to avoid a vehicle, which started to enter the intersection and then temporarily stopped while in the intersection. Despite initially pausing, this vehicle then executed an aggressive maneuver, swiftly turning across three lanes of traffic.

While stopped at a red light, a Pony.ai AV in supervised (“Drivered”) autonomous mode was rear-ended twice in quick succession by a passenger vehicle. Immediately following the incident, the Pony.ai safety operator disengaged the Pony.ai AV from autonomous mode. There were no injuries reported.

A Pony.ai AV, operating in supervised autonomous ("Drivered") mode, collided with road debris, slightly damaging its rear bumper.  Immediately prior to the incident, the safety driver noticed a flat item was in the center part of the lane, disengaged from autonomous mode, and attempted to dodge the debris. There were no injuries reported.

LiDAR was not calibrated properly so our test vehicle got too close to the front vehicle which the AV System uses
for tracking. The test driver applied the brakes and the AV System automaticaly disengaged.

There were some areas without Lane marking on I -580, I-5. Our AV System's perception software detects the lane
markings but automaticaly disengages after 1 sec if lane detection is lost. Lane detection was lost.

There were some areas without Lane marking on I -580, I-5. Our AV System's perception software detects the lane
markings but automaticaly disengages after 1 sec if lane detection is lost. Lane detection was lost.

There were some areas without Lane marking on I -880. Our AV System's perception software detects the lane
markings but automaticaly disengages after 1 sec if lane detection is lost. Lane detection was lost.

Overcast, heavy traffic, 15 miles, another vehicle crossed in front of our test vehicle at high speed into our lane
and then continued to the next lane. Our AV System tracks the vechicle immediately in front of our test vehicle
so the AV System accelerated BUT after the high speed vehicle passed to the next lane, the car immediately in
front was stopped! The test driver applied the brakes and the AV system automaticaly disengaged.
